entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?
Hi, I'm calling about an order I received yesterday. The bike I ordered seems to be damaged.
I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please provide me with your order number so I can look into this for you?
Thank you. Okay, I see your order here. Can you describe the damage you're seeing?

Well, the box had a big dent in it, and when I opened it, I noticed the bike's frame. It's actually cracked frame near the seat post. Also, one of the wheels seems to be a bit wobbly wheel when I spin it. I think it was clearly shipping damage.

I understand. A cracked frame and a wobbly wheel certainly indicate shipping damage. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. At VeloFit, we strive for customer satisfaction. I want to make this right for you immediately.

I've already processed a full refund for the bike. You should see it reflected in your account within 3-5 business days. Also, there is no need for you to keep the damaged bike, I will arrange for it to be collected. I will email you a free label for easy return. Just repackage it in the original box when you get a chance and we'll get it picked up. No cost to you, of course.
Really? That's amazing! I appreciate that so much.
You're very welcome. Again, I apologize for the damaged bike and the inconvenience. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thank you so much for your help!
You're very welcome! Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day!
